title: [Ruins, Barrier Dais]
description: Seemingly floating just above the water, this circular dais contains assorted altars positioned around a yellow barrier, each with an offering placed on top.  A profusion of massive stone platforms covered in ruins spread out above the inner lagoon, while the yellow barrier shimmers with light, providing a way back to the atoll.

Massive floating stone platforms are connected by obsidian walkways.  Assorted altars are positioned around the barrier, each with an offering placed on top.  The yellow barrier shimmers with light offering a way back to the atoll.
